sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const CandidateProfile = () => { const [profile, setProfile] = useState({ name: "Gaurav Kumar", email: "gaurav@example.com", phone: "+91-9876543210", skills: ["JavaScript", "React", "Node.js", "MongoDB"], resume: "", about: "Enthusiastic full-stack developer with a passion for building scalable web applications.", }); return (

Candidate Profile

{profile.name}

{profile.email}

{profile.phone}

{profile.skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}

{profile.about}

); }; export default CandidateProfile;
